content.text: Pretty good! Just got home from work. Wbu?
Not bad. I'm about to get some housecleaning done.
I'm not very close to my family, but I'm working on it.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What happened?
My mom and I had a bit of a falling out when I was younger, but I'm trying to repair the relationship.
That's good to hear. I'm sure it'll be fine.
I hope so! How about you, are you close to your family?
Yeah, I'm pretty close to them. We talk on the phone every day and visit each other as often as we can.
Don't be! I'm sure you'll be close to your family one day.
